name: Magnemite

attacks.name: Thunder Wave
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Selfdestruct
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to each Pokémon on each player's Bench. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Magnemite does 40 damage to itself.

flavorText: Uses anti-gravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses Thunder Wave and similar moves. LV. 13 #81

strengths: Thunder Wave can paralyze for only 1 Lightning energy
Selfdestruct deals massive 40 damage to the Active Pokemon
Bench damage from Selfdestruct can soften up or knockout weak Pokemon
Low retreat cost of 1 provides mobility
Evolves into Magneton for more powerful attacks
weaknesses: Selfdestruct damages itself for 40, guaranteeing a knockout
Selfdestruct damages your own bench as well as opponent's
Thunder Wave's paralysis is unreliable (50% chance)
synergies: Mr. Mime's Invisible Wall can block Selfdestruct's bench damage to your Pokemon
PlusPower increases Thunder Wave to 20 damage or Selfdestruct to 50
Use Selfdestruct when opponent has a full bench to maximize damage spread
Switch or Scoop Up can save Magnemite if you change your mind about Selfdestruct
counters: High HP Pokemon that can survive Selfdestruct
Mr. Mime to block bench damage
